definition.zh_def: 國家，特指具有主權的政治實體，通常由一群人組成，擁有共同的文化、語言或歷史。
definition.en_def: Countries or groups of people who share a common identity, often defined by geographical boundaries and governance.
definition.example: Many nations came together to discuss climate change at the summit.
